description: 1850 time-slice simulation with 1850 SSTs, 1850 WMGHG concentrations (except methane) and 2014 methane concentrations.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 2, piControl perturbation,  1850 SST, 1850 WMGHG, 2014 methane
long_name: pre-industrial climatolgical SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 methane concentrations (including chemistry)
rationale: To compute the ERF for 1850 and 2014.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 30 years
requirements.label: 1850-1851 30yrs

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea surface temperature from the piControl experiment
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: PIControlSST

requirements.description: Impose repeating 1850 Well Mixed Green House Gas (WMGHG) concentrations, except methane.
requirements.keywords: 1850, Well Mixed, Greenhouse Gas, GHG, no Methane, no CH4
requirements.label: 1850WMGHGNoMethane

requirements.description: Use and Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
